column4: Hello all!  I have a Ubuntu 8.10 system that I'd like to update to 9.04 but I don't get the option to do so from the Update Manager like the online docs suggest.  Could there be a setting somewhere on my system that is supressing that option?
Is there another way to complete the upgrade from 8.10 to 9.04?  Edit sources.list directly?
sudo aptitude update; sudo aptitude full-upgrade; sudo do-release-upgrade
